title: For Sale:  Muzzle Brake for your AR or any other platform
postcontent:
If you are looking for a muzzle brake for your AR or Bolt Action rifle , take a look at Grizzly Gun Works . These folks offer some of the most awesome brakes available out there . I was trying to find some one reputable to turn down my bull barrel and then thread and mount a muzzle brake with no luck . I did a little looking around and came across Grizzly's web site and was convinced this might be an alternative . I have ordered a bolt on brake from them and am looking forward to mounting this on my Rock River Arms Varmint Rifle .  Check out their sight , you might find something for your firearm , what ever it might be .  I ordered mine over the phone and Jeff was extremely helpful and patient . I have every confidence what I have ordered will be of the highest quality , so do your self a favor , if you are looking for a solution to muzzle flip as well as esthetically pleasing looks , give a look at their site ! As soon as I apply the brake and have an opportunity to shoot thru it I will post my findings .

Muzzle brake came yesterday , mounted it for before after pic's then went to the range and ran a few rounds through it .  Right picture is before brake , left picture is after .  Shot the first group then cleaned the bore , applied the brake permanently and shot the second group . This was at 100 yards . Thank you Grizzly Gun Works . I will order a brake from them for a DPMS I have . They offer both threaded and none threaded brakes . $250.00 is what this brake cost , and they do not make the brake for your specific firearm until you place the order .These groups were done quickly to test target reacgusition . Proved to do well !!

title: For Sale:  Syracuse Inner Harbor Gun Rally
location: Inner Harbor, New York, United States
postcontent:
Saturday March 23rd @ 11am to 2pm.  

Compliments from Syracuse.com

By staff writers Sistina Giordano and Tim Knauss

Syracuse, NY – Turn Albany Upside Down, an organization that grew out of Republican candidate Carl Paladino's campaign for governor in 2010, obtained a permit to hold a protest opposing the NY Safe Act on Saturday at Syracuse’s Inner Harbor, according to Syracuse City Hall.

The rally is a prelude to a "March on Albany'' to be scheduled next month, according to the online announcement. Besides Turn Albany Upside Down, sponsors include several Upstate Republican Party and Conservative Party chairs, and gun advocacy groups including Women for the Second Amendment (W2A) and The Oath Keepers of NYS.

State Conservative Party Chairman Mike Long will be the keynote speaker. Paladino also will speak. Tom Dadey, Onondaga County Republican Party chairman, said he will attend.
AP060213017704.JPG Mike Long AP  
The rally is scheduled to begin at 11 a.m. although organizers have invited the public to start gathering there at 10 a.m. It is expected to end at 2 p.m.

Gov. Andrew Cuomo has also been invited to give his views on passing the Safe Act. "You are the governor and as such, you should face the people directly to explain both the reasoning for this law as well as the history of how it was drafted. You will be given the floor and as much time as necessary to justify your reasoning," the release states.

Cuomo defeated Paladino for governor in 2010, 61 percent to 34 percent..

Former Arizona Sheriff Richard Mack, a nationally known gun rights advocate, will speak at the rally against the "tyrant named Cuomo,'' according to a press release Mack sent today.

Mack rose to prominence in the mid-1990s when he sued the Clinton administration over the Brady gun control law, which resulted in a Supreme Court ruling that the law violated state sovereignty by requiring local officials to conduct background checks on gun buyers. Mack has called the federal government ''the greatest threat we face.''

The Safe Act was the first state gun control law to be passed following the Sandy Hook Elementary School shootings in Newtown, Conn. The new law, which Cuomo signed Jan. 15, sets a seven-bullet limit on magazines used outside of competitions or gun ranges, tightens the definition of illegal "assault weapons" and requires owners of formerly legal semi-automatic guns to register them.

Cuomo has said the new law "will limit gun violence through common sense, reasonable reforms that include addressing the risks posed by mentally ill people who have access to guns and banning high capacity magazines and lethal assault weapons."

Forget your buddy's Night Vision scope.  This scope is 5 levels above that old antiquated technology.

title: For Trade:  Spiderco Woodlander
postcontent:
This is a discontinued model from Spiderco, Woodlander model by Jerry Hossom it features a 6 inch blade and 12 inch overall length.


The Spyderco FB18 Woodlander is a large fixed-blade knife that goes hand-in-hand with the outdoors. It mitigates most cutting challenges nature deals out, large or little. This knife includes a full-bellied cutting edge, an upswept tip, and a comfortably rounded spine. A handguaurd behind the cutting edge, a finger choil, and deep jimping on the thumb ramp all keep the hand engaged on the handle, whether light cutting or all out chopping. The Woodlander is made up of a full steel and slab construction. It also comes with a Kydex sheath. There is a wrist lanyard located in the blade with another in the handle. The handles is made of a contoured Micarta which glides its way to the flat-ground blade. The Spyderco FB18 Woodlander is made in Italy. Jerry Hossom started making knives over 25 years ago, doing so professionally since 1997. "I avoid knifemaking boundaries and prefer making models that don't fit any predisposed category, but are task or role specific as to function".

title: For Sale:  Highly Modded Glock 34
postcontent: I have been contemplating selling my 34 to fund a new project, mods are: Slide has been cnc machined, windows cut in sides, and front of slide has been cut to an angle on the bottom to take away from the blocky Glock look.  Slide internals are; polished striker, titnium plunger, custom cut to length tungsten guide rod running non-captured springs(have several springs to go with).  Factory glock barrel, lone wolf 6.2in threaded barrel with EFK firedragon Compensator, and lonewolf 6-port barrel made specifically for the G34.  Slide has been drilled and tapped with Burris Fast Fire mounted on top infront of the rear sight.  Gun still has fixed sights as "backups".  Frame internals:  Zev-tech fully adjustable fulcrum trigger, adjustable for overtravel and pretravel.  Zev-tech 2.5lb race connector fully polished.  Custom ejector housing with over travel adjustment screw. Zev-tech titanium ejector, LW hardened extractor.  Reduced power striker spring with ghost cups, heavy comp trigger spring.  All pins have been replaced with titanium pins.  Zev-tech ext large mag release. Frame itself has been modified as well: double undercut trigger guard and front of guard has been rounded.  The backstrap of frame has been slightly reduced in girth to flatten out the grip.  The frame was then stippled and the whole gun was then cerakoted black.  A dawson precision ICE magwell was then installed.  I have alot of money in this gun, ALOT!  This is not a gun for someone who just wants a bedside gun for home protection this a shooter than runs, runs well, and runs fast.  With the lightened slide, fulcrum trigger, and ported barrel or threaded and comp setup this gun functions lightning fast. Asking price is $2,300 with everything, I know its the price of 3 or 4 glocks but I know its not for everyone but if your interested text 704-902-nine two eight zero and ill send pics.  If someone wanted the slide only I could part with that and build next project off of a new slide and keep my frame, just let me know if your interested.  The slide will fit a 17, 22, 31, 34, or 35.  SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY IF YOU DONT HAVE INTEREST IN BUYING PLEASE DONT WASTE MY TIME I WILL NOT REPLY TO EMAILS. THANKS

title: For Sale:  SMITH & WESSON 547 9MM REVOLVER - RARE FIND!
postcontent:
Have you ever seen a 9mm revolver that didn't use moon clips? Now you have. This is the S&W Model 547. It is a heavy barrel, 9mm (9x19 luger) version of the legendary K-frame, 6-shot M&P revolver. S&W made 10,270 of these from 1980-1985; 6486 round with butt (and 3" barrel), and 3784 with a square butt and 4" barrel (as pictured below). Supposedly, this was the most difficult-to-manufacture revolver that S&W ever made. 

This one is like new with the box with and cleaning kit (copy of owners manual), This is the scarce one with the square butt and the 4 inch heavy barrel there were 3784 made of these in the early to mid 80's. I am the second owner and I have not fired it and I was told by the first owner that it had a total of 6 rounds fired.

I was keeping this sweet revolver as an investment but with the new laws going in to effect soon I have decided to sell it and not pay a dealer consignment and other fees that would drive the price up for the buyer. I am listing this on armslist for 1 week if not sold to a local buyer within the next week I will list in on gun smoker. I will ONLY sell to a local party at this time if you are not a local buyer you will need to watch for it on gun smoker late next week.

title: For Sale:  9mm, .223, .22lr, .45, .40, etc
postcontent:
Stop paying these outrageous prices for ammo on here. Ammo is returning to shelves, guns are returning to displays. I have been on Cabela's website and ordered 250 rounds of 9mm ($70 including shipping), 100 rounds of .22 ($13 including shipping) and 100 rounds of .308 ($70 including shipping). That was 3 different days this week alone. 
People are hoarding ammo and selling portions here to break even or turn a profit. Don't overpay. This is a sight where you are supposed to get good deals from the gun community, not to get ripped off by people jumping on the bandwagon to make a profit. 
If you can wait a couple days for buying ammo, buy online through stores, or check your local shops periodically. Shops are limiting sales due to the hoarding assholes who are selling on here. This is why you are seeing more and more people on here selling a single box of ammo instead of 1000 rounds. 
Let these hoarders be stuck with ammo, do not buy until prices are back to normal! Believe me, the market is stabilizing, ammo is not the thing to overpay for. Nor are guns. I walked into Dick's Sporting goods, they have some of the rifles like the 10/22 in stock, and its for $250, not $350-400. 

Go to the home page of ARMSLIST and select the Feinsteins Favorites, you will see, prices are slowly dropping.

North American Arms mini-revolvers are equipped with a unique safety giving
its owner maximum protection against accidental discharge. The safety
cylinder feature allows the gun to be carried fully loaded. There are
halfway notches between the chambers. After loading, the hammer is lowered

or 22 Long Rifle. With a barrel length of 1-5/8" or 1-1/8", both calibers
offer a lightweight concealed carry pocket gun with a 5-shot capacity.
Using the half-way notch cylinder, the hammer may rest safely and securely
away from live or empty chambers without chance of accidental discharge.
The steel frame is fitted with a handy locking black holster grip with a
pocket clip and fixed blade front sight. The holster grip unfolds and locks
to become the handle of the gun. Press the release button and the
mini-revolver folds back into the grip. For added safety, when the holster
grip is folded, the trigger of the gun is completely enclosed making it

title: For Sale:  Denver Co. Concealed Carry Course
location: 401 East 58th Avenue, Denver Colorado, Denver, Colorado
postcontent:
Thank you for your interest in Equip 2 Conceal Firearms Group.
If you're looking to obtain your Concealed Carry Permit for the state of Colorado, we have just the course for you! This course will take place in a classroom setting held at the Comfort Inn & Suites, in Denver Colorado. 

This firearm safety course is approximately 3 hours in duration, starting from 10am to 1pm. If you are new to firearms, have no fear as one of our NRA certified pistol instructors will assist you & provide an array of tips and knowledge to help you reach the level of skill and proficiency you're looking for. In just 3 hours, you will have learned about a multitude of topics such as:

*Pistol cartridges & Components
*Pistol Knowledge & Safe gun handling 
a)Semi-automatic knowledge
b)Revolver knowledge

*Gun Safety Rules
*Pistol Operation
*Ammunition Malfunctions
*Maintenance & Cleaning

*Holster selection/Concealment techniques
a)Safety & responsibility by law of firearms around children
b)Restricted Carry Areas
c)Weapons Laws
d)Shoot/Don't Shoot Scenarios
e)Use of Force and Justification

Upon successful completion of this course you will have met and exceeded the certification training requirement for a concealed carry permit in your state. The cost of this course is $125, which covers the issuing of all of your materials needed for your CWP.

Pre-registratio​n is STRONGLY advised to guarantee yourself a seat in the class, and avoid the $10 surcharge for walk-ins. For any questions or additional info, please feel free to contact us at REDACTED

title: For Sale:  SCAMMER ALERT!
postcontent:
So last Sunday I responded to a listing on here for a Glock 26.  I told the guy I could meet him that day to pay him, he said he couldnt meet, but would the next day.  Later in the day I noticed the ad was taken down, and I sent him a follow up email regarding it, he told me he agreed to sell it to a guy in Milford and ship it to an FFL.  I said that was bogus because he already agreed to sell it to me.  He said if I paid him via paypal he would sell me it, so I did.  then he stopped answering my emails, the next night he told me he didnt get to ship it, but would the next day, the next day comes and he says he wants to refund me, but cant because paypal put a hold on his account.  I am now going through the dispute process with paypal.  Paypal has tried to contact him to verify that he wont be shipping the item, but he will not answer them or myself.  All he has to do is tell paypal hes not shipping it, and I'll have my money back.  Instead he wants to make me wait out the entire dispute process, which means it could be 45 days before I get my money back.

DO NOT do business with "Joseph J"  he said he was a registered FFL, and his email is phonedrj@gmail, DO NOT do business with this dude, super shady, and is making it 10x ahrder for me to get my money back than it needs to be.  I located what I think is his FFL listing, so at one point he may have been legit, but not now for sure.

title: For Sale:  BLACK TALONS, REAL WINCHESTER 9MM, WATCH 4 FAKES IN B. T. BOXES!
postcontent:
REAL B.T.'s have VERY sharp edges on BLACK bullets, not copper jackets, AND NICKEL cases. WINCHESTER SXT's and some others have black bullets BUT they don't open into the black talon "mushroom" which looks like a tiny circular saw blade AND IS SHARP ENOUGH TO CUT YOUR FINGER. Look at the bullet and where the grooves come up from the case to the hollow point, they should make sharp points. SXT's join into rounded ends and mushroom into a "FLOWER" shape rather than a saw blade. Some sellers are putting other brands into BLACK TALON BOXES SO BEWARE! These are AUTHENTIC 9MM BLACK TALONS. I can't do photos but you can probably research it if you don't want to get ripped off. No shipping, trades, or offers, thanks. Local cash sale only, they're being sold as COLLECTORS, not shooters. They've been in my safe since bought new in the early 1990's.
If you want a response, LIST A PHONE NUMBER OR IT GOES TO SPAM with complaints from the rip-off crew.
